channel.title: Code for Blood Barrage in PimpScape?
channel.description:
OK, I was editing some stuff in PimpScape, and I accidentally changed the visual effect code for Blood Barrage.. I wanted to know if someone could tell me what the code is, thanks.
If you don't know what I'm talking about, here's an example.
Ice Barrage's visual effect code is 369 or 370. If you searched for 'ice barrage' in the client.java for PimpScape, it would say:
attackPlayersWithin(369, 40, 10);
If you searched 'blood barrage' in your client.java, I'd be asking for the number where '369' would be.[br][size=1]Posted on: March 21, 2007, 10:22:16 PM[/size][hr]OMG, rofl.. Sorry for making this thread. I found it.
Lock please, thanks!

item.title: Code for Blood Barrage in PimpScape?
item.dc:creator: @Nirvana.Marijuana Nirvana.Marijuana
item.description:
@Nirvana.Marijuana wrote:

if(spellID == 12929) // blood barrage (lvl 92 spell) { if(playerLevel[6] >= 114) { if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 30)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(4278, 30)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(566, 10)==false)) { sendMessage("You do not have enough runes to cast this spell."); sendMessage("You need 30 "+getItemName(560)+", 30 "+getItemName(4278)+" and 10 "+getItemName(566)); } else if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 30)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(4278, 30)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(566, 10)==true)) { startAnimation(1979); stillgfx(377, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); hitDiff = 6 + misc.random(34); NewHP += hitDiff / 2; if(NewHP > getLevelForXP(playerXP[3])) { NewHP = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]); } updateRequired = true; castOnPlayer.inCombat(); inCombat(); PkingDelay = 15; castOnPlayer.sendMessage("Your life has been drained!"); sendMessage("You drain the enemys life and add it to yours."); deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 30); deleteItem(4278, getItemSlot(4278), 30); deleteItem(566, getItemSlot(566), 10); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; } } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 114) { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 115 to cast this spell."); } }

Read full topic
item.source: Code for Blood Barrage in PimpScape?

OK, I was editing some stuff in PimpScape, and I accidentally changed the visual effect code for Blood Barrage… I wanted to know if someone could tell me what the code is, thanks.

If you don’t know what I’m talking about, here’s an example.
